thread.section_title: Hotel Tourisme Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: What a little jewel
thread.title_full: What a little jewel - Review of Hotel Tourisme Avenue, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: azim711
title: What a little jewel
text:
Gaelle, Dep Gen Manager and all the staff were great. So attentive and professional. We arrived late in the evening, but easy and fast checked-in with the friendly Mr Mano. Emails to hotel were replied within the hours.
The most important thing: the location. Just a few minutes away from Eiffel Tower on foot. Train, bus n taxi stations right in front of the door step. Lots of shops / restaurants around. Will surely stay again.
